import React from 'react'; import './CSS/home.css'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css'; const Home = () => { function Nomination() { window.location.href = "/nomination"; } function Vote() { window.location.href = "/vote"; } return (

Employee of the Month

Recognize your peers. Vote for your favorite. Celebrate the winners.

Recent Winners

); }; export default Home;
